title: Andre Bot
description: A Discord built to transcribe voice channels into desired text channels.

title: Discord Bot Tutorial
description: A detailed set of instructions for creating and deploying a Discord bot (for free).

title: Critical Reminders
description: A Chrome extension built to web-scrape assignments from MyCourses and add them to .ics files.

title: Chrome Extension (v2) Tutorial
description: A detailed set of instructions for constructing a basic Chrome Extension, and how to publish it.

title: Web Hosting
description: A detailed set of instructions on how to host web applications. Little to no cost involved if a current student.

title: Database Hosting
description: A detailed set of instructions on how to host MySQL and MongoDB databases.
